document.full_text: the release of two types of radioactive particles in the first 3-4 days of japan's nuclear crisis is estimated to have reached 20-50 percent of the amounts from chernobyl in 10 days, an austrian expert said on wednesday.
document.title: japan iodine release lower than chernobyl: expert
lines_and_colors: the release of two types of radioactive particles in the first 3-4 days of japan's nuclear crisis is estimated to have reached 20-50 percent of the amounts from chernobyl in 10 days, an austrian expert said on wednesday.
